stories.text:
Passionate about programming and cryptocurrencies, I have created a repository to collect resources to allow people to learn about bitcoin and cryptocurrencies in general. There is no structure of the document yet but I would like to put together the basics and make a document that meets the needs of a maximum of people.

If you are interested and want to participate clone the github repository and let's all contribute and build an information warehouse to prepare the future generation on bitcoin and blockchain.

Thank you all.

https://github.com/nejos97/Resources-for-learning-about-bitcoin-and-blockchain
stories.title: Contribute to collect resources to learn about Bitcoin and blockchain

I'm seeking advice for my startup idea...yes, I know there are several out there...

If you like watching anime, could you please give me some advice by filling the form below? Replying here is also appreciated - I'll read every comment and am happy for discussion.
